All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Contact
A model class representing a contact with a first name, last name, email, phone number, and password.
DietController
Controller class for managing diet plans.
DietPlan
A model class representing a diet plan for a pet in the Pet Care application.
Exercise
A model class representing an exercise session for a pet.
ExerciseController
Manages user interface for logging pet exercises
HelloApplication
 
HomeController
Controller class for handling user interactions in the home screen of the PETHUB application.
HomeMainController
Controller class for handling the main home view in the Pet Care application.
IContactDAO
Interface for the Contact Data Access Object that handles the CRUD operations for the Contact class with the database.
IPetDAO
Interface for data access operations related to pets in the PETHUB application.
LoginController
A Class that contains all the methods needed for the login interface to run and be controlled by the user's input
MockContactDAO
A mock implementation of the IContactDAO interface for testing purposes.
MockLogin
Class for handling user login functionality in the Pet Care application.
MockPetDAO
A mock implementation of the IPetDAO interface for testing purposes.
MockSignup
Class for handling user signup functionality in the Pet Care application.
NavigationController
Controller class for managing the navigation bar in the PETHUB application.
PasswordUtil
Utility class for hashing passwords using the SHA-256 algorithm.
Pet
A model class representing a pet in the PETHUB application.
PetProfileController
Controller class for managing the pet profile functionality in the Pet Care application.
SceneLoader
Utility class for loading and switching between scenes in the Pet Care application.
ScheduleController
Controller class for managing the Scheduling Functionality in the Pet Care application.
SettingController
Controller class for managing the Setting's functionality in the Pet Care application.
SignupController
Controller class for managing the sign-up process in the Pet Care application.
SqliteConnection
Singleton class for managing a connection to the SQLite database for the Pet Care application.
SqliteContactDAO
Implementation of the IContactDAO interface using SQLite as the database.
SqliteDietDAO
A data access object (DAO) class for managing diet plans in an SQLite database.
SqliteExerciseDAO
A data access object (DAO) class for managing exercise records in the Pet Care application using SQLite.
SqlitePetDAO
A data access object (DAO) class for managing pet records in an SQLite database.
